name: Mail Art Package
description: Do you like receiving mail? I sure do. Not only do I like receiving mail, but I also love sending it off. When you purchase this Mail Art Package you'll receive a collection of original drawings, stickers and paper goods made (and collected) by me, Effie Dee. Each Package will arrive in an handmade hand decorated envelope, and is sure to brighten up your day! Each package will have no less than five items in it. To see some other things I've sent out go HERE

name: One Angry Sassy Girl
description:
When I feel sad or bad or mad I draw angry sassy girls in ink and it cheers me up.

I will post one to you if you like

do you need an angry girl in the mail to cheer you up?

name: Random Mystery Badge
description:
One random badge from the remainder of my 2012 collection. 

I'm going back to school this year and I want to start fresh, so these might be the last paper clay badges I make for a while. 

Each badge is hand sculpted and painted by myself, and then coated with an epoxy resin. This listing is for a random badge, colours and styles can't be guaranteed, but if you send me a message after purchase with preferred colours I will do my best to meet your needs. 
Mostly, I have yellows, blues some greens, a few pinks and some purples. There is the occasional eyeball badge and some cartoon bears. 

These badges make great gifts for men and women, and look awesome on caps, collars, backpacks, purses and underwear!

Contact me at me@effiedee.com if you'd like to buy many badges, and I will work out a deal for shipping etc.

name: Custom Made Pet Portrait Brooch
description:
I will draw/paint/mixed media your pet apply it to a badge backing made of polymer or paper clay (depending on the size and style of the badge).
Any pet is ok! I am happy to paint lizards, rats, frogs, bugs, husbands etc.
Am also happy to put a magnet backing on your finished piece if you want your beloved friend on the fridge. Contact me if you want any other options (necklaces etc) before purchase.
